name: Colby College Museum of Art
reviews: The best thing about this museum is that it's free. I know they have received a ton of great art over the years but five of the galleries were closed off....
For a small college like Colby, this art museum is surprisingly comparable to museums at much larger universities. And it keeps getting bigger and better....
Surprisingly nice collection and the Marsden Hartley exhibit was excellent!!
